meanings.sent1: I must not overload my backpack with too many books.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overload her plate with food at the buffet.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fit all those toys in one box will surely overload it.
meanings.sent4: His brain felt like it was about to overload with all the information.
meanings.sent5: The circuit will overload if you plug in too many devices at once.

meanings.sent1: The overload of homework stressed the students out.
meanings.sent2: There was an overload of traffic on the highway during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: The overload of sweets at the party made the kids hyper.
meanings.sent4: The overload of emotions made her burst into tears.
meanings.sent5: The overload of work left him feeling exhausted at the end of the day.
